settings.quote: Every time I’m in my darkest spots, or need a burst of inspiration, Sounds True is here. So Thanks beyond belief to everyone who makes this great resource available to us.”
settings.author: Jasper

settings.quote: I wanted to thank you all for all of your help and guidance I’ve received during the past year. It has changed my life in so many ways. I appreciate everything and could never thank you enough”
settings.author: Jamie

settings.quote: Sounds True provides the most valuable and abundant high-quality free content of any organization I’ve ever come across. I am extremely grateful for your generosity.”
settings.author: Sayid

settings.title: There’s a Ritual for That

settings.gaurantee_popup_content:
We unconditionally guarantee your satisfaction with all Sounds True products for one year when purchased via our website or catalog. If a Sounds True product fails to meet your expectations—for any reason—simply return it with receipt for a full refund. For items purchased from Sounds True that are manufactured by other companies, we indicate the warranty period in the product description.

Please note: Refund requests over 120 days from the purchase date will receive a check, as funds cannot be returned to the credit card due to fraud protection policies.

All downloadable audio and video titles are also covered by a one-year guarantee.
Event and Training cancellation policies vary by program. Please click the 'More Information' button on the product page to see specifics.
